title: Redux Routing
description: A React-Redux application showcasing state management, routing, and data fetching. Features include centralized state management with Redux, dynamic product data fetching via API, and seamless navigation using React Router.

title: The Mejor Project API
description: A comprehensive backend solution for CRUD operations with optimal performance. Built with the MERN stack, featuring clean architecture and RESTful design principles.

title: Employee Management System
description: A React-based web application with separate dashboards for Admin and Employees. Features task management, user authentication, and real-time updates.
